medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's abdominal pain began 5 days ago and has not abated since onset. The pain is associated with nausea, loss of appetite, and poor oral intake. Denies fevers or chills but reports malaise.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of DVT, chronic renal insufficiency (baseline Cr 1.4-1.7), hypertension, gout, crush injury to the right foot with hypersensitivity, and a left sciatic injury. History of biliary colic.
medical_history.family_history: Father had parkinsonism. Mother had acute myocardial infarction (AMI) and acute renal failure (ARF). Brother had AMI.
